actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Carolinas Revolutionary Road National Heritage Area in the States of North Carolina and South Carolina, and for other purposes.
short_title: Carolinas Revolutionary Road National Heritage Area Act

summary.text: Carolinas Revolutionary Road National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Carolinas Revolutionary Road National Heritage Area in North Carolina and South Carolina. Designates the Cultural and Heritage Museums of York County, South Carolina, as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Cultural and Heritage Museums to submit a management plan for the Heritage Area.

titles.title: Carolinas Revolutionary Road National Heritage Area Act
To establish the Carolinas Revolutionary Road National Heritage Area in the States of North Carolina and South Carolina, and for other purposes.
